pull.title: qt: Add Copy Address Action to Payment Requests
pull.body: Currently, the only way to copy the address of a payment request is to double-click on the payment request and then click on the copy address button. This PR adds a convenient context menu action to copy the address of a payment request. | Master | PR | | ----------- | ------------ | | ||

events.body:
Updated from 405215f -> 24fcd97, addressed @Talkless suggestion

Changes:
- `sel` is now `const`
Concept ACK. I've noted the same inconvenience :)

@jarolrod

This pr, which is submitted on 2021-02-19, is based on the branch commit from 2020-11-05. While it has no ACKs, maybe rebase it to eliminate CI glitches?

Updated from 24fcd97 -> 8871d9a

Changes: Rebased to a more recent master branch in order to avoid CI glitches on @hebasto recommendation

events.message:
qt: Add Copy Address Action to Payment Requests

Currently, the only way to copy the address of a payment request is to double-click on the payment request and then click on the copy address button. This commit adds a convenient context menu action to copy the address of a payment request.

events.body:
Updated from 8871d9a -> e348d7e

Changes:
- Closer adherence to [clang-format](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/.clang-format)
re-ACK e348d7ea2c0b5d2eb8039dab33b0b9a48655885f, only suggested changes since my [previous](https://github.com/bitcoin-core/gui/pull/213#pullrequestreview-595520204) review.

comments.body:
I understand that this comment follows the surrounding code style.
But isn't it worth to add a Doxygen comment into the header instead of such an approach?

UPDATE: this slot is private, so feel free to ignore my comment.

style nit (see [clang-format-diff.py](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/tree/master/contrib/devtools#clang-format-diffpy)):
```suggestion
    const RecentRequestsTableModel* const submodel = model->getRecentRequestsTableModel();
```

---

btw, why `submodel` variable is required at all? It does not improve readability, at least for me :)
Maybe just
```
    const QString address = model->getRecentRequestsTableModel()->entry(sel.row()).recipient.address;
```

This line could be [shorter](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/20986) then 100 characters, if s/`sel`/`r`

Feel free to ignore the second part of this comment.

style nit (see [clang-format-diff.py](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/tree/master/contrib/devtools#clang-format-diffpy)):
```suggestion
    QAction* copyAddressAction = new QAction(tr("Copy address"), this);
```
addressed the first half of your comment in e348d7e
